remarks: Law of noncontradiction.  The intersection of a subspace and its orthocomplement is the zero subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dochnoncon.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochnoncon.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnoncon.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dochnoncon.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochnoncon.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnoncon $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( X i^i ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = { .0. } ) $.
